backend/main.mo: Defines core types, authorization helpers, persistent state maps, and basic user/profile/order logic with health check and access control integration.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides written summaries of key frontend files for reference during build or review.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining CSS variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, theme colors, icons, and display settings.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing network-first navigation handling, cache-first asset fetching, and cache versioning.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing and bootstrap flow handling identity, safe actor creation, profile loading, admin checks, and error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI component showing an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Displays a full‑page error screen for failed profile bootstrap with retry, logout, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication, status display, and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/NoProfileBl: Shows a screen for authenticated users without a profile, with principal ID copy support and admin‑contact instructions.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal shown to the first administrator to enter a name and trigger initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Guards child content based on resolved user role, showing loading or access‑denied states when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Top‑level error boundary that catches unhandled errors and shows a recovery UI with reload and logout options.
frontend/src/components/errors/ErrorDeta: Collapsible panel showing raw technical error details with clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/errors/InlineErr: Inline error alert supporting retry and expandable technical details, with special messaging for stopped canisters.
frontend/src/components/exports/ExportAc: Dropdown actions for exporting orders in various formats, including karigar‑specific PDF/JPEG exports with status toasts.
Layout wrapper that builds role-based navigation and renders mobile/desktop menus with connectivity indicators.
frontend/src/components/masterDesigns/Ma: Dialog for creating or editing a master design entry with form fields and save handling.
Dialog to upload, parse, preview, and import master design files, showing errors and import summary.
Table displaying master designs with edit and activate/deactivate actions.
frontend/src/components/orders/Ingestion: Preview table showing parsed order data, highlighting unmapped designs and missing karigar names.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersFil: Filter bar allowing users to filter orders by karigar, date range, CO flag, and status.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrdersTab: Displays a table of orders with optional status update controls and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/components/status/BackendSt: Shows backend online/offline state with canister ID display, refresh button, and collapsible error details.
frontend/src/components/status/Connectiv: Shows online/offline status and pending offline sync queue with manual sync trigger.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReachabilit: Periodically checks backend health, classifies errors, and exposes online/offline status and canister data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyToClipboard.ts: Provides clipboard copy functionality with temporary success/error status labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Fetches the current user's profile with error classification and controlled retry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useEffectiveAppRole.t: Derives the user’s effective app role by combining profile data with backend admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and provides login/clear actions via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching orders, master designs, unmapped codes, and for batched order uploads with progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Creates a backend actor with timeout, optional authenticated setup, and retry rules using react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with light and dark color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/exports/karigarOrdersDo: Generates a printable PDF-like HTML document for Karigar orders and triggers the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/lib/exports/ordersExport.ts: Exports filtered orders to CSV based on type (all, CO, daily, karigar) and triggers file download.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/applyMasterDesi: Maps orders to master design entries, preserving meaningful karigar names and collecting unmapped codes.
frontend/src/lib/mapping/normalizeDesign: Normalizes design codes by trimming and collapsing whitespace for consistent comparisons.
frontend/src/lib/orders/chunkOrders.ts: Splits orders into fixed-size batches for chunked uploading.
frontend/src/lib/orders/deriveMetrics.ts: Calculates aggregate order metrics including totals and karigar-wise breakdown.
frontend/src/lib/orders/formatKarigarNam: Formats karigar names, defaulting empty values to 'Unassigned'.
frontend/src/lib/orders/getOrderTimestam: Derives an order's timestamp from uploadDate or createdAt and provides date matching helpers.
Checks whether an order type string represents a customer order.
frontend/src/lib/orders/sortOrdersDesign: Sorts orders by normalized design code and then by order number.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseMast: Parses master design data from an Excel workbook, normalizing headers, validating required columns, and returning design entries.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/parseOrde: Parses order data from an Excel workbook by mapping flexible column names, validating fields, and converting rows into Order objects.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/excel/readWorkb: Loads the XLSX library if needed and reads an uploaded Excel file into a validated SheetJS workbook.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/masterDesignPar: Determines file type and parses master design data from either Excel or PDF using the appropriate parser.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/orderParser.ts: Selects PDF or Excel parsing for order files and converts them into Order objects with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/extractText: Dynamically loads PDF.js and extracts structured text from each PDF page for downstream parsing.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseMaster: Parses master design entries from extracted PDF text by locating headers and interpreting each data line.
frontend/src/lib/parsers/pdf/parseOrders: Parses PDF-extracted text to build Order objects, supporting both table-row and section-header formats. Detects karigar names and validates rows before creating orders or throwing an error if none found.
Parses a single PDF table-row line containing an explicit karigar column, extracting order fields with validation. Returns a populated Order object or null on failure.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Renders the main App component.
frontend/src/offline/db.ts: Implements IndexedDB storage for offline orders, master designs, ingestion queue, and metadata. Provides CRUD helpers for caching, queueing, and retrieving offline data.
frontend/src/offline/sync.ts: React hook that processes queued offline ingestions, uploading them in batches and updating sync state. Handles errors, progress, and query invalidation after sync.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing orders filtered by date with metrics, tables, and export actions. Supports karigar-wise grouping, downloads, and persistent date selection.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MasterDesignsPa: Displays and manages master design mappings with search, add, import, and edit functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementP: Provides a form to create user profiles, validate inputs, assign roles, and handle creation errors.
frontend/src/pages/karigar/KarigarDashbo: Shows karigar-specific order metrics and a table of assigned orders with status updates.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: UI page showing a login screen with branding and a LoginButton. Displays a styled background and centered auth card.
frontend/src/pages/setup/BootstrapAdminP: Allows entering a bootstrap token to initialize the first admin and triggers actor reinitialization.
frontend/src/pages/staff/IngestOrdersPag: Handles parsing, mapping, previewing, and batch-uploading order files with progress and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/staff/StaffDashboardP: Displays all orders with filters, metrics, exports, and navigation to upload new orders.
frontend/src/pages/staff/UnmappedDesignC: Displays unmapped design codes grouped by code with search and a dialog to add mappings.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker, logs lifecycle events, and periodically checks for updates.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapErrorClassif: Classifies bootstrap-related errors, detecting stopped canisters, network issues, and extracting canister IDs.
frontend/src/utils/errorPresentation.ts: Converts errors into user-friendly messages using bootstrap classification and custom heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, supporting hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout that rejects if the operation exceeds a specified duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, existing issues, and feature requirements for fixing bootstrap loading behavior.
